title: What was the number 1 song in September 1987? - Quora

response.answer_text: La Bamba by Los Lobos was the number 1 song on the Billboard Hot 100 for 3 weeks starting August 23 thru Sept. 12 I Just Can’t Stop Loving You by Michel Jackson with Sedah Garrett was number 1 for 1 week Sept. 13 -19. Didn’t We Almost Have It All by Whitney Houston spent 2 weeks at number 1, Sept. 20 thru Oct. 3.
